step1.title: Start New Project
step1.description: Give your change initiative a name and select an appropriate icon.

step2.title: What is your goal?
step2.description: Describe what you want to achieve with this project. The clearer your goal, the better I can support you.
step2.goalPlaceholder: e.g. We want to understand employee satisfaction during the restructuring and develop targeted measures to improve acceptance...
step2.tip: Tip: Describe both the desired outcome and the current context.

step3.title: Data Input (Optional)
step3.description: Do you already have documents? Upload them to generate initial insights.
